title: "The Yes case for the voice is logical and rational. It’s No that’s confused, inconsistent and incoherent"
excerpt: "The Yes case for the constitutional referendum on a voice to parliament and government could not be more straightforward, logical or rational: it would establish a representative body so Indigenous Australians would provide advice about matters that affected them."
